attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: This app will take your parents away if they don’t have papers and guess wut a big fat old orange 🍊 runs this app he looks like a potato 🥔 and orange 🍊 he looks dumb but wut  I want to say is that THIS APP IS ALSOOO RACIST WHO WANT A RACIST APP NO ONNEEEE!!!!!! Please take this app down take this horrible app down!!!!!

attributes.title: Just terrible!
attributes.review: This app is so trash! They gave me a recipe to cook Alfredo sauce and I don't even like Alfredo sauce but it made me cook some anyway and it was STRAIGHT GARBAGE! The fact that an app associated with the president would give me such a trash recipe is beyond me! You're lucky to get one star🙃

attributes.title: DISTURBING AND LIFE RUINING😳💯
attributes.review: after downloading this app, and showing my mother a photo of the horrifying orange oompa loompa, my mom and i have died due to the trauma of these photos. i am actually writing this review from heaven and god told me to tell y’all to remove this app and get rid of the orange man 2020.

attributes.title: Awful App
attributes.review: I- where do I start. This app is offensive to everyone except white cis males since it is made in support of a homophobic, racist, misogynistic Cheeto of a man should be in jail and not even be allowed to be in the runnings for president with all of the allegations against him. 🤩 Dump Trump 2020 😻🧚‍♀️❤️

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: App continually shuts down as soon as it loads. This app is giving my phone glitches. I had to delete the app then restart my phone to get it back working.

attributes.title: EW APP
attributes.review: This app is THE WORST, i downloaded it so i could keep track of everything out beautiful president had to say but it HACKED MY PHONE, it downloaded a bunch of pictures of cheeto man into my phone and KILLED MY FAMILY, would not recommend

attributes.title: disgusting🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and now i am not going to vote for an orange who is going to ruin our country. Instead of Make America Great Again he’s gonna Make America Worse America Again. This orange is unprofessional and disgusting. #annoyingorange

attributes.title: Never again
attributes.review: This app as soon as I opened it started giving me some real pedo vibes. I said no sir not today, so let me tell you hide your women hide your children and most importantly hide your melanin.

when i downloaded this app it was going fine but then cheeto man appeared all over my phone my apps changed into cheeto shapes my wallpaper was HIM GETTING A TAN and then all my pictures got replaced with tre picture of him getting TANNED 🤮😫💔💔💔

attributes.title: A Hello From Heaven
attributes.review: Hello. I am here to formally say that this man is an awful person. I do not like Cheetos. The smell makes me gag so the thought of having this man in heaven disgusts me. He teargased people to show that he goes to a church that he has never went to. I do NOT approve.
